website_summaries.verdict: A good middle-of-the-road oil filter that balances decent performance and longevity.
pros: Specifically designed to filter out a high amount of dirt from different oil formulas
Provides excellent performance and protection for around 5,000 miles
cons: Does not last as long as other, more premium, oil filters

customer_reviews.title: Worked just like they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Glad to get them and I bought a spare so it saves me from worrying about having it when I need it..
customer_reviews.author: SECRET SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Fits volvo penta 13 hp engine
customer_reviews.text: This filter fits a volvo penta MD7a or MD6a Diesel engine. A lot cheaper than volvo filters! I bought 30 weight oil also on amazon. Best deals around for your engine needs.

customer_reviews.author: Larry D.

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says it is. I order ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is. I order my oil supplies off Amazon so I don't have to look up my filter type every time I shop, I just reorder this.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Love the Grip
customer_reviews.text: An oil filter is an oil filter in my opinion but the grip on the bottom of these really sets the FRAM filters apart from the rest. The Grip material does not ever seem to chip or come off and it makes twisting the filter off by hand a lot easier. The grip is more than just a gimmick in my oppion.
customer_reviews.author: Granty Grant
